The announcement by the Morton County Sh: s Department stating their plans to fine anyone bringing supplies to protesters at Standing Rock.
Confirmation from officials representing: s Department and the North Dakota Department of Emergency Management that the threat of a fine had replaced a physical blockade.
Statements from Maxine Herr: a spokeswoman for the Morton County Sheriff's Department, indicating that law enforcement would take a more "passive role" in preventing supplies from reaching the camps, by issuing fines for vehicles attempting deliveries.
Governor Jack Dalrymple: s assertion that state officials have no plans to set up roadblocks or fine people carrying supplies to protesters, emphasizing that it is the responsibility of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to handle the situation on federal land.
